Your license to use P3 AppLocker 1.6 is limited to the number of licenses purchased by you. You shall not allow others to use, copy or evaluate copies of P3 AppLocker 1.6.

3.2 Use Restrictions

Without limiting the foregoing, use, display or distribution of P3 AppLocker 1.6 together with material that is pornographic, racist, vulgar, obscene, defamatory, libelous, abusive, promoting hatred, discriminating or displaying prejudice based on religion, ethnic heritage, race, sexual orientation or age is strictly prohibited.

Each licensed copy of P3 AppLocker 1.6 may be used on one single computer location by one user. Use of P3 AppLocker 1.6 means that you have loaded, installed, or run P3 AppLocker 1.6 on a computer or similar device. If you install P3 AppLocker 1.6 onto a multi-user platform, server or network, each and every individual user of P3 AppLocker 1.6 must be licensed separately.

You may make one copy of P3 AppLocker 1.6 for backup purposes, providing you only have one copy installed on one computer being used by one person. Other users may not use your copy of P3 AppLocker 1.6 . The assignment, sublicense, networking, sale, or distribution of copies of P3 AppLocker 1.6 are strictly forbidden without the prior written consent of Clinton D\’souza/Qode21. It is a violation of this agreement to assign, sell, share, loan, rent, lease, borrow, network or transfer the use of P3 AppLocker 1.6. If any person other than yourself uses P3 AppLocker 1.6 registered in your name, regardless of whether it is at the same time or different times, then this agreement is being violated and you are responsible for that violation!

3.3 Copyright Restriction

This Software contains copyrighted material, trade secrets and other proprietary material. You shall not, and shall not attempt to, modify, reverse engineer, disassemble or decompile P3 AppLocker 1.6. Nor can you create any derivative works or other works that are based upon or derived from P3 AppLocker 1.6 in whole or in part.

Clinton D\’souza/Qode21 retains sole and exclusive ownership of all right, title and interest in and to P3 AppLocker 1.6 and all Intellectual Property rights relating thereto.
